title: Grateful Dead Live at Nassau Coliseum on 1981-05-08
source: Cassette Audience Master: Recorded By Jeff Hellman (lead deck) > Eddie Claridge (2nd deck) > Jim Wise (3rd deck); Sennheiser MD421 Dynamic Cardioid Microphones-TC D5 Cassette Recorders; Location: Soundboard Stand permitted by Dan Healy; Analog to Digital: Dolby B Decoded Cassette Master played back on Nakamichi Dragon-Korg MR-1000(DSF[1-bit 5.6448 MHz Stereo]) Korg AudioGate-WAV[24/96] Transfer by David Minches; Editing (Adobe Audition CC)-FLAC encoding (dBpoweramp); Tagging (Tag & Re-name)
